IPTV Extreme Pro v29.0 [Patched] {KatCore}.apk


Watch IPTV from your service provider or free live TV channels from the WEB.

If you usually use VLC or IPTV bouquet for Dreambox to watch TV this app is for you.

â˜… PLEASE NOTE THIS APP DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY CHANNLES â˜…


You need to use your own IPTV list to watch channels


I suggest to install VLC for Android, or better, MX Player if the default Video Player is not able to Play streaming video


Basic Function Video :(Thanks to "Il CIELO SUL TUBO" user for the video)


Features:


â˜… Integrated Player (Advanced & Light)

â˜… Parental Control

â˜… Remote Controller support

â˜… Backup / Restore Settings

â˜… M3U playlists support

â˜… Multi EPG support (TV Guide)

â˜… Auto EPG update

â˜… EPG alias management

â˜… All the EPG providers are included

â˜… Picons support in different size

â˜… Ability to download On Demand Programs!

â˜… Ability to record Live Streaming with time limit!

â˜… More than 10 Themes availables!

â˜… Time Recording

â˜… Timers Management

â˜… Autostart On Boot Function

â˜… Set Memo function for Events on TV Guide

â˜… Sliding EPG time


Additional features are available in Pro version:


â˜… Ad free (if correctly purchased)
